# vegetablesSriLanka


## Installation

You can install the development version of vegetablesSriLanka from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("thiyangt/vegetableSriLanka")
```

## Example



```{r example}
library(vegetablesSriLanka)
data("vegetables.srilanka")
```
